data.title: Breaking News - "VH1's Family Reunion: Love & Hip Hop Edition" Returns Monday, November 28th at 8PM ET/PT
data.text:
"VH1'S FAMILY REUNION: LOVE & HIP HOP EDITION" RETURNS MONDAY, NOVEMBER 28TH AT 8PM ET/PT

Alexis Skyy, Amara La Negra, Chrissy Lampkin, Emjay Johnson, Estelita, Gunplay, Jenn Coreano, Jim Jones, Karen "KK" King, Karlie Redd, Khaotic, Lyrica Anderson, Mama Jones, Mariahlynn, Miami Tip, Nikki Baby, Phresher, Safaree, Scrapp Deleon, Shay Johnson, Shekinah Jo, Spice, Sukihana, Teairra Mari, Tokyo Vanity and Trick Daddy set to appear on the popular hip-hop docuseries

(New York, New York) Monday, November 7 - VH1 today announced its wildly popular hip-hop docuseries, VH1's Family Reunion: Love & Hip Hop Edition, is set to return for season three on Monday, November 28th 8PM ET/PT. Building from last season's success, VH1's Family Reunion: Love & Hip Hop Edition brings back the original family of Love & Hip Hop, along with many fan favorites from all four cities, and takes the series international for the very first time with the cast heading to Jamaica.

This season cast members get a fresh perspective of what it means to be "family" and continue the tradition of celebrating Black Excellence during an action-packed, fun and revealing two week-long gathering full of friendship, foe-ship, secrets, flings and forgiveness. The star-studded cast features favorites from Atlanta, New York, Hollywood and Miami, including Alexis Skyy, Amara La Negra, Chrissy Lampkin, Emjay Johnson, Estelita, Gunplay, Jenn Coreano, Jim Jones, Karen "KK" King, Karlie Redd, Khaotic, Lyrica Anderson, Mama Jones, Mariahlynn, Miami Tip, Nikki Baby, Phresher, Safaree, Scrapp Deleon, Shay Johnson, Shekinah Jo, Spice, Sukihana, Teairra Mari, Tokyo Vanity and Trick Daddy.

VH1's Family Reunion: Love & Hip Hop Edition is executive produced by Lashan Browning, Donna Edge-Rachell, Paris Bauldwin, Daniel Wiener, Mimi Adams, Rich Allen, Michael Carrozza, Gavin Jones, and Alissa Horowitz. Sitarah Pendelton-Eaglin, Phakiso Collins and Jubba Seyyid are executive producers for VH1.

Join the conversation using #LHHFamReunion and follow the official Love & Hip Hop accounts on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and TikTok.

PARAMOUNT MEDIA NETWORKS & MTV ENTERTAINMENT STUDIOS

Paramount Media Networks & MTV Entertainment Studios is one of the preeminent media entities in the world that connects with global audiences through its nine iconic brands - MTV, Comedy Central, VH1, CMT, Pop, Logo, The Smithsonian Channel, Paramount Network and TV Land - and its Studios arm which produces acclaimed series and movies as well as award-winning documentaries through MTV Documentary Films.

About Antoinette Media

Antoinette Media, founded by industry veteran Lashan Browning, is a full-service production company specializing in authentic, buzzy, mass-appeal content creation for television and film. Since its inception in 2022, Antoinette Media has taken the reins of VH1's massively successful Love & Hip Hop franchise, spearheading a creative rebrand that propelled the network to multi-year highs in an unprecedented reversal of cable ratings trends. Plus, new series Caught in the Act: Unfaithful has also proved a blockbuster, setting social media on fire while driving VH1 to its biggest quarterly ratings growth in more than three years. Starring Tami Roman, the provocative relationship format was renewed for a second season ahead of its premiere -- signaling the arrival of a bold new television franchise. Additionally, Antoinette Media produces Couples Retreat, Family Reunion, Shaunie & Keion's Destination I Do and more.
